requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor @ 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: *Integrated Graphics for Low Settings, GTX560, AMD 5770, or Equivalent, 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Audio
  • Additional Notes: *Integrated Graphics will most likely play the game, but at low performance. A graphics card is highly recommended
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor @ 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX750ti or AMD Equivalent, 1.0GB+ VRAM
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Audio
  • Additional Notes: *Most modern Graphics Cards should perform optimally. Overall game performance also depends on number of bots set by player relative to their hardware; greater bot counts may perform better on more capable hardware.
